decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - 1       The  conversion of the property into  the three  flats would, by reason of   
          the loss of a  single family dwellinghouse,  without providing suitable  
          replacement family accommodation, be an over intensification of  
          use, giving rise to increased noise and disturbance to the neighbouring   
          properties and would be contrary to  the Policies ENVB 1.1 
          (New Development) and H3.4 Conversions of Houses to  Flats) of the   
          Unitary Development Plan, (2003). 
             
    2       The  conversion of the property into three flats would, by reason of the    
              loss of a single family dwellinghouse and the resulting intensification of    
              use would be out of character with this dwellinghouse and the local area 
              and  not serve to preserve or enhance the character of the Spring    
             Grove Conservation Area, contrary to the Policy ENVB 2.2,   
             (Conservation Areas) of the Unitary Development Plan, (2003).
description: Conversion of existing single family dwellinghouse to 3 flats.
